Interface RobotPart

All Known Subinterfaces:
Actuator, Motor, Sensor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRobotPart, Arm, Blaster, Camera, Chassis, Frame, Leg, Rotor, Torso, Wheel
public interface RobotPart
Interface defining the main methods for a generic Robot part, i.e., the ones to manage its energy.
Author:
marcoortolani

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getCurrentEnergy()
    Returns the current energy level of this part.
    double
    getInitialEnergy()
    Returns the initial energy level of this part, calculated as the base energy coefficient multiplied by the standard base energy level.
    void
    refillEnergy()
    Restores the energy level of this part to the initial energy level.
    void
    updateEnergy(double delta)
    Updates the energy level of this part by adding the given delta.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentEnergy

      double getCurrentEnergy()
      Returns the current energy level of this part. This value is always between 0 and the initial energy level.
      Returns:
      the current energy level of this part

    • getInitialEnergy

      double getInitialEnergy()
      Returns the initial energy level of this part, calculated as the base energy coefficient multiplied by the standard base energy level.
      Returns:
      the initial energy level of this part

    • updateEnergy

      void updateEnergy(double delta)
      Updates the energy level of this part by adding the given delta. The delta can be positive or negative, but the energy level cannot be negative. If the energy level exceeds the initial energy level, it is set to the initial energy level.
      Parameters:
      delta - the amount to be added to the energy level

    • refillEnergy

      void refillEnergy()
      Restores the energy level of this part to the initial energy level.
